nodes.text: The Bestine Capitol Building, also referred to as the Tatooine Capitol building or as the Imperial Capitol, was the building situated in Bestine that was home to the Imperial leaders of the Tatooine government. The capitol building was in operation by the time of the Galactic Civil War following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, and contained offices for a number of Tatooine's most important political officials, including Governor Tour Aryon, Prefect Eugene Talmont, Officer of Defense Victor Visalis, and Director of Commerce Sean Trenwell.
The Bestine Capitol Building was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
